message: Let's make a deal, Bob. This offer benefits us both, but time is of the essence!
Let's meet in the middle, Alice. Time is ticking!
Bob, my friend, this offer is still generous considering the time pressure. Let's be reasonable and close this deal!
Inflation is biting me harder, Alice. I need a better split to make it worthwhile.
Bob, I'm offering you a larger share than last time to account for the inflation. Let's wrap this up before it's too late for both of us!
